history.content: Well I'm currently taking CS 161 with Weaver, so I'm not sure how helpful this is, but the class isn't too much of a workload compared to other upper divs. You have 3-4 homeworks, 3 projects, and that's pretty much it. You have plenty of time to work on the homeworks and projects, but the class is notorious for difficult projects, which is true. Also, this semester we only had office hours on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday, and no office hours on Thursdays or Fridays, which is a royal pain.

children.subject: It will definitely be harder than any other semester you've done, but isn't impossible.

history.content:
Hey,

Spring 2020 will be second to last semester and I want to make the maximum of my time at Berkeley. I was wondering is it doable\good idea to do CS 161, EE 127 and CS 189 together given the professors who are teaching it (Wagner, Ranade, Shewchuk)? What is the workload like? In the past, I've taken CS170, EE16B and CS 188 at once and CS 70, Data 100 and EE16A together but I think this combination might be a stretch. I've also taken stat 140 and 61c. Personally, not too concerned with grades but lowkey also don't wanna stress.

I would love it if y'all could give some insights/recommendations! Thank you.
history.subject: Thoughts on taking CS 161 + CS 189 + EE 127 + Easy breadth together?
